Prebons face nearly turned to shock. this bot seemed like it was completely=
 oblivious to the name Prebon. His very name was spoken with honor for bein=
g the Trainer of some of the most successfull units in the Predacon army. "=
My name is Prebon, remember it with respect and dignity." this bot obviousl=
y needed to be taught some order. Prebon began to wonder if that is why he =
had been selected to transfer to this out of the way rock in the universe.
=
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:23 PM
  Subject: RE: It's S=
howtime


  Attilla:

  "Don't press your luck, dwarf" said inside his mind=
 the male and told to Preborn with the same tone "Follow me... with whom I =
have the honor?"
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
  =
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 3:15 AM
    S=
ubject: Re: It's Showtime


    Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot=
 was slightly taller and more armored than himself, The former Trainer lead=
er always tried to size up a possible opponent before a fight. "Very well" =
he said crossing his arms tightly in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask S=
hivah about how I AM to be treated." His arms went to his sides and he turn=
ed towards the door. "If you would be so considerate as to introduce us I w=
ould be greatfull" He continued in mock courtesy making a request sound lik=
e an order.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: airly2000@yahoo=
.com 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:=
13 AM
      Subject: RE: It's Showtime


      Attilla:

      "Nope, it is=
n't the way " answered  Attilla "What do you think if Shivah solve this tro=
uble... He can explain you what happened Ok?"
        ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
        From: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    =
    Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 AM
        Subject: Re: It's Showtime
=


        Prebon stepped out, his memories were either gone or distorted bu=
t his leadership programs were still intact. He remembered how roughly he w=
as treated and how he was slammed into the CR chamber. To top it off he was=
 always cranky when he woke up. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he =
yelled. He saw Predacon emblem on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a PO=
W. "Is this any way to treat one of the Predacons best training units?" his=
 record of service would have spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when =
he left the Predacons to start his own unit.
          ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
          From: airly2000@... 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogr=
oups.com 
          Sent: Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
          Subject: =
RE: It's Showtime


          Attilla:

          "Memories erased, reprogr=
amation ended"thought Attilla "This guy is ready to start duties."

       =
   Attilla typed some buttons and watied to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

 =
         The bot was ready to fight just in case.
